result.title: Analysis of European structures to support microalgae wine producers
result.description: Industrial and manufacturing-scale price and cost modelling techniques will be employed to inform design, development and operational decisions, in turn determining manufacturing system capacity, throughput, modularity, economies of scale, economies of scope, etc. The ultimate goal is to establish a range of financial metrics to inform.REDWine’s business plan (Task 1.1), with important and relevant econometric guidance, will influence the initial target market sector. The financial models created will encompass a) the development of cost-efficient cultivation systems for wine producers, b) integration of wine production liquid effluent for Chlorella growth and wastewater recycling, c) supply of exhaust CO2 as inorganic carbon source for Chlorella growth and CO2 bioremediation, d) efficient energy use, e) industrial control, sensors and automation and f) valorisation of Chlorella biomass as feedstock to obtain ingredients for food, cosmetic and plant biostimulant as a way to diversify wine producers’ business models and to generate higher revenues.

result.title: Communication plan
result.description: The strategic communication plan defines the target audiences, key messages, communication channels and implementation plan, based on a thorough stakeholder analysis. The plan will be produced by AVIPE in M6 and updated in M24 and M48 to include reports on the implemented activities. Communication activities laid out in the plan will be implemented in the scope of this task for both online and offline activities.

result.title: Early Warning and Digital Twin Platform release notes and user manual
result.description: This deliverable is the result of the GIS Based Early Warning and Digital Twin Platform development activity. It includes all the related release notes and users manual. The document is a guide on how to operate and interact with the Early Warning and Digital Twin Platform. It describes the functionalities implemented in the Platform and operational procedures on how to monitor faults and start and stop services. Since the Early Warning and Digital Twin Platform is a backend system, the guide is meant for technicians. For each release of the Platform a corresponding release note will be added to this guide to describe new features, improvements or bugs fixed in that release.

result.title: Communication plan [update 1]
result.description: This will be the first update. The strategic communication plan defines the target audiences, key messages, communication channels and implementation plan, based on a thorough stakeholder analysis. The plan will be produced by AVIPE in M6 and updated in M24 and M48 to include reports on the implemented activities. Communication activities laid out in the plan will be implemented in the scope of this task for both online and offline activities.
